posts.post_title: 1887 Old Judge N172 Billy Sunday SOLD! THANKS!
posts.post_content: I have For Sale a nice 1887 Old Judge Cigarettes N172 BIlly Sunday. You don`t see alot of Billy Sundays cards for sale. Asking $500.00. Please email me at [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url] if interested. Thanks for Looking!  Marc SOLD! THANKS!
Got is and it's great!  Thanks!
